#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,n,j;
    long int count;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(i=1;i<=t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n],b[n];
        count=0;
        for(j=0;j<n;j++) scanf("%d",&a[j]);
        for(j=0;j<n;j++) scanf("%d",&b[j]);
        sort(a,a+n);
        sort(b,b+n);
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        {
            if(a[j]>=b[j]) count+=a[j]-b[j];
            else count+=b[j]-a[j];
        }
        printf("Case %d: %ld\n",i,count);
    }
    return 0;
}
